meanings.sent1: The contiguousnesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy to assemble.
meanings.sent2: The map showed the contiguousnesses of the countries in the region.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that the students' desks had a contest for contiguousnesses.
meanings.sent4: The seamless contiguousnesses of the dance moves mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The contiguousnesses of the bricks in the wall ensured its stability.

meanings.definition: The quality of being adjacent or touching.
meanings.sent1: The contiguousnesses of the books on the shelf made them easy to find.
meanings.sent2: The road construction aimed to maintain the contiguousnesses of the lanes.
meanings.sent3: The siblings argued over the contiguousnesses of their rooms' boundaries.
meanings.sent4: The artist emphasized the contiguousnesses of colors in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The seamless contiguousnesses of the fabric pieces created a beautiful quilt.
